div.p: Recognition, because I’m a local photographer I think a lot of people do recommend me for like babies, christenings, events that like
you know just capture the moment... “Oh you’re that photographer, you’re that photographer, I know you...” and
well a popular thing though but it’s just recognition you know which is a good thing because obviously they see me through my work
not through anything else, you know, “oh there’s that trouble maker you know he gets drunk every weekend...”
They all go “Where’s your camera?” they always ask me you know some photography work so my work is me, my photography is me, it’s kind of developing me.
